Your Style, Our Passion

Elevate your everyday with up to 50% off selected styles
Angus and Coote

At Angus & Coote, we strive to help you find the perfect styles for every occasion, from pieces that show off your unique look to gifts that speak from the heart. We love giving our customers great value, without compromising quality, for jewellery and watches you can enjoy for many seasons.

The Diamond Collection catalogue presents a selection of diamond and fine jewellery, chosen to elevate your everyday. Enjoy up to 50% off selected styles across the collection, offering the perfect opportunity to invest in pieces that feel both timeless and beautifully designed.

From radiant diamond designs to elegant gold and gemstone pieces, each style is selected for its enduring appeal. Whether you are refining your signature look or selecting a meaningful piece to mark a special moment, this collection offers jewellery that feels both classic and effortlessly modern.

March welcomes the calming beauty of aquamarine; a birthstone admired for its soft blue hues and graceful presence. Elegant and versatile, aquamarine brings a fresh sense of sophistication to any jewellery collection.

Our passion for style extends beyond jewellery. Discover our curated range of watches, designed with precision, beauty and longevity in mind. Each timepiece reflects a balance of form and function, perfect for everyday elegance or a refined statement.

As Australia’s trusted diamond destination since 1895, our experienced team is here to offer thoughtful advice and genuine service. Visit us in-store and discover pieces chosen with your style at heart.

All offers valid for a limited time only, or while stocks last. Prices as marked. Selected items only. Products may have been sold below the ticketed price prior to the current discount offer. Not valid with any other offer or discount. Discounts are off the regular ticketed/displayed price. Products may not be shown to actual size. We reserve the right to correct pricing errors. For full terms and conditions visit in store or https://www.anguscoote.com.au/terms-conditions
